algorithmes
Class SelectionneurTDFA

java.lang.Object
  algorithmes.SelectionneurTDFA
All Implemented Interfaces:
Selectionneur, Serializable
public class SelectionneurTDFA
extends Object
implements Selectionneur

A linear gradient-descent version of Watkins Q(lambda) SeeSutton & Barto p 213 Q-Learning and the erratum for the details.

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Francesco De Comite (decomite at lifl.fr)
See Also:
Serialized Form

See Also:
Learning rates for Q-Learning

geometricDecay

protected boolean geometricDecay
Alpha decay methods
  • Geometric : use decayAlpha
  • Exponential : use alphaDecayPower (default)

bestSoFar

ely

private EligibleTiles ely

rouletteWheel

protected boolean rouletteWheel
How to implement randomness ?
  • epsilon-greedy
  • Roulette wheel selection
  • Boltzmann
      • Roulette wheel or Boltzmann selection makes epsilon useless.

protected boolean epsilonGreedy

getGeometricDecay

public boolean getGeometricDecay()
How convergence is controlled ?
  • true : alpha decays geometrically
  • false : alpha decays exponentially

Learn

Specified by:
apprend in interface Selectionneur
Parameters:
s1 - The state the agent is in before the action is performed.
s2 - The state the agent goes to when the action is performed.
reward - The reward obtained for this move.
a - The action the agent took.
